title: DTL OTMaster 3.7 Manual
content:
Karsten Lücke updated the DTL OTMaster 3.7 manual. The PDF can be downloaded from [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143801/http:/www.fontmaster.nl/pdf/OTM_manual.zip), and the printed edition can be purchased at [DTL’s Bookshop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143801/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Shops/BookShop/contents/en-us/d1.html), or directly at [Lulu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143801/http:/www.lulu.com/content/paperback/dtl-otmaster-manual/14201201).

FEB
author: blokland
